function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decline in flourishing prevalence contributing to escalating healthcare expenditure.","Impact":"Increase in healthcare spending due to declining well-being.","Mitigation":"Promote mental health and well-being initiatives to strengthen protective factors and resources for flourishing.","Technologies":"None specified.","People":"Individuals with declining well-being.","Owner":"Health organizations and policymakers."},{"Description":"Lack of focus on promoting mental health and well-being.","Impact":"Neglect of measures to enhance well-being and thriving.","Mitigation":"Initiatives to specifically promote mental health and well-being are needed.","Technologies":"None specified.","People":"General population.","Owner":"Health organizations and policymakers."}]}
